shortdesc.ph: Reports the statistics of the remote audio stream during a call.
Reports the statistics of the audio stream sent by each remote user during a call.
Callback with statistics of the remote audio stream during a call.
Callback for statistics of the remote audio stream during a call.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, RemoteAudioStats stats)? onRemoteAudioStats;
public virtual void OnRemoteAudioStats(RtcConnection connection, RemoteAudioStats stats) {}

section.p: The SDK triggers this callback every 2 seconds for each remote user/host sending an audio stream. If multiple remote users/hosts are sending audio streams, this callback is triggered multiple times every 2 seconds.

This callback is triggered every 2 seconds for each remote user/host who is sending an audio stream. If multiple remote users/hosts are sending audio streams, this callback is triggered multiple times every 2 seconds.
